title: Stripe valued at $35 billion in latest funding round
text: Financial technology company Stripe Inc. obtained a new $250 million investment that values it at $35 billion. The company had notched a $22.5 billion valuation back in January after another funding round. General Catalyst, Sequoia, and Andreessen Horowitz are among the investors behind Stripe's latest round of funding. Stripe plans to use the funding to further its global expansion, with aims to be in 40 global markets in the next few months, up from 34 currently. The company also intends to use the funds for product enhancements and new capabilities for enterprise users.
